thread.title: Gregor L
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Gregor L

author: Gregor L
title: Gregor L
text: Ordered the jacket in a medium which upon receipt was slightly too large, return postage is prepaid and was easy to complete. I received an email letting me know it had been received and the same day a smaller jacket was dispatched which fits perfectly.
